alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Noxubee and eastern Kemper Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 844 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scooba, or 11 miles east of De Kalb, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Paulette around 900 PM CDT. Cooksville around 905 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for east central Mississippi.
